title: Friends list mouse over text not showing up
body: When I hover over a friend on my fiends list, the mouse over popup that shows how long they've been in game for isn't showing up. Does anyone know how to fix this

replies.body:
Hey Liu,

Can you check to see if it's working again?
yes its working now thanks. Its happened once before after a tft game also, is there a way i can fix this on my own?
I think on EUW it was intentionally disabled for a while so the platform could instead use those resources on the influx of new TFT players.  Maybe the same was true for NA?
